abilitygroupdescription.p: These abilities represent training in the use of staves, halberds, bill hooks, glaives and other pole-arms in combat.

abilitydescription.p: Characters equipped with a staff, staff or polearm can strike with it during combat doing weapon damage.
Characters equipped with a staff can brace against a charge striking first and doing extra damage.

The character swings their weapon in large arcs keeping foes at bay. Opponents must make a Mettle check to attack and the character may roll to hit the first opponent who tries to do so in the round as a reaction. If successful the opponent cannot close to attack.
Note that this ability requires a reasonable amount of space to swing the weapon, and it only works when the opponents are within a 180Â° arc.

ability:staff.parry When a character is attacked they may attempt to parry the blow using their weapon instead of making an armour roll. This ability spends the characters reaction for the round. If the parry result fails and a boon is rolled the attack deals half damage. If the parry result fails and a bane is rolled the attack deals double damage. If the parry check succeeds the attack does no damage.
